articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches New Type Anti-ship Rocket Launching Drill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches New Type Anti-ship Rocket Launching Drill
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, watched a drill of firing new type anti-ship rockets.
					 The rockets, which were developed at the ultra-modern level, are being deployed at the naval units of the KPA to go into action.
					
					 At an observation post he received a report on the drill plan and gave an order to start the drill.
					
					 Then rockets soared into the sky in order.
					
					 Kim Jong Un watched with great attention the flight of the rockets on a display.
					
					 The highly intelligent rockets safely flew at the designated altitude, accurately detecting and hitting the "enemy" warship.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction, saying the rockets accurately hit the target and their capability for discerning target is very high.
					
					 Saying the capabilities of the new type anti-ship rockets being deployed at the naval units of the KPA to go into action have been fully demonstrated through the drill, he noted with great pleasure that it marked another fresh milestone in bolstering up the Juche-based naval force and the KPA navy's operational capability has been remarkably increased with the drill as a momentum.
					
					 Ultra-modern strike means of Korean style have been studied and developed one after another recently to completely contain the hostile forces, he said, adding that this is a proud fruition of the devoted efforts of the scientists, technicians and munitions industrial workers in the field of defence science.
					
					 He indicated tasks to be fulfilled to further beef up the KPA navy and bring the defence science and technology of the country to a world level.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance Given by KPA Service Personnel
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance Given by KPA Service Personnel
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, enjoyed an art performance given by the art squads of KPA Units 526, 762, 534 and 380 which proved successful at the second contest among art squads of the KPA corps.
					 Put on the stage were diverse numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by laying an eternal foundation for the prosperity of thriving Korea under the uplifted banner of Songun, and made an impressive artistic representation of the proud service personnel of the KPA dynamically advancing toward the final victory under the commandership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by the performance.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was greatly pleased to enjoy the performance high in its ideological and artistic value staged by the art squad members with art pieces of high cognitional and instructive significance as they vividly reflected the political matters advanced by the Party.
					
					 He extended the thanks of the supreme commander to the creators and artistes of those units for successfully staging the performance with pieces representing the ardent love of the service personnel for the homeland and their ambition to perform feats.
					
					 Noting the art squads of the KPA corps are playing the role of a mike of the Party, he indicated tasks to be fulfilled by them.
					
					 He called for creating and staging more pieces conducive to fully training the service personnel of the KPA to be core elements equipped with Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, those dealing with the issues that should be always held fast to in the ideological education of the KPA including the five-point education, those helpful to raising the revolutionary and class awareness and those dealing with the relations between the army and the people, the unity between officers and men and revolutionary optimism. 
					
					 Among the audience were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Ryom Chol Song, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon and service personnel of the KPA.

articles.title: Stand of DPRK to Bring about Landmark Turn in Improving Inter-Korean Relations Clarified
articles.content:
Stand of DPRK to Bring about Landmark Turn in Improving Inter-Korean Relations Clarified
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government Monday released a statement to mark the 15th anniversary of the north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of national division, and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il provided the Pyongyang summit and adopted the June 15 joint declaration true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung who dedicated all his life to the cause of national reunification. It marked a historic event which brought about a turning-point in improving the north-south relations and achieving national reunification, the statement notes, and continues: 
					
					 The publication of the June 15 joint declaration made it possible for the north and the south of Korea to defuse the distrust and confrontation which had lasted for more than half century and greet a new era advancing toward reconciliation, unity and reunification by concerted efforts of the Koreans. 
					
					 Had the north-south relations made steady advance along the way indicated by the June 15 joint declaration, eye-opening changes and successes would have been achieved in the drive for national reunification, the desire of the Korean nation.
					
					 However, the north-south relations were brought back to the era of confrontation in the past due to the despicable moves of the Lee Myung Bak conservative group which totally denied the north-south joint declarations and this catastrophe has reached a grave phase at present.
					
					 Upon the authorization the DPRK government in its statement clarifies the following stand, prompted by the will to save the north-south relations from a serious crisis and bring about a landmark turn in national reconciliation and unity: 
					
					1. It is necessary to have a firm stand to improve the north-south relations and solve the reunification issue independently by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 It is the basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration to solve issues related to the inter-Korean relations and the matter of the country's reunification independently by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation responsible for it.
					
					 The north and the south should settle all the issues arising in improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving reunification in line with the interests and desire of the nation with strong national self-respect.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop soliciting "international cooperation" to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north by relying on outside forces, not leaving the national issue to their tender mercy. 
					
					 They should come out for improving the inter-Korean relations and solving the reunification issue by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					2. The south Korean authorities should not seek "unification of social systems" inciting distrust and confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 Now that differing ideologies and social systems have existed in the north and the south for the past seven decades, any attempt to achieve reunification under one social system would bring nothing but confrontation and war.
					
					 The north and the south recognized the common points in the north-proposed federation of lower stage and the south-proposed confederation in the June 15 joint declaration and agreed to work for reunification in this direction.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly understand that the co-existence and co-prosperity of the north and the south irrespective of ideology and social systems are the most reasonable and realistic way for national reunification.
					
					3. The south Korean authorities should stop north-targeted war exercises in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean authorities staged ceaseless war rehearsals against the north such as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in league with the U.S., chilling the desire of all Koreans for reunification and scuppering the golden chances for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations can never improve nor can the Korean peninsula get rid of the danger of a nuclear war as long as these military threat and provocations persist.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should halt such dangerous act as leaving the life and safety of the Koreans exposed to the war shambles of aggressors as a shock brigade in carrying out the U.S. strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 There is no need for them to feel any uneasiness and fear of the DPRK's self-defensive deterrence for protecting the dignity, stability and peace of the nation but they should discontinue acts of treachery of taking issue with it.
					
					 They should put a definite end to all military drills with the U.S. and come out for defending peace and stability on the Korean peninsula by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 4. It is necessary to create a climate for mending the north-south relations.
					
					   Slandering each other is a venomous practice fostering distrust and hatred towards fellow countrymen and such practice, if unchecked, may lead to physical conflict and war.
					
					    The south Korean authorities should not just pay lip-service to "confidence-building " and "improvement of relations" but stop all provocations of rattling the nerves of the DPRK and slandering it. 
					
					    The south Korean authorities should boldly remove the legal and institutional barriers blocking north-south contacts, visits, exchange and cooperation and create environment favorable for repairing the relations. 
					
					5. The north and the south should take practical measures to implement the historic north-south joint declarations.
					
					   The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are valuable agreements made at the summits of the north and the south for the improvement of the relations and co-prosperity and solemn promises made by the north and the south authorities to the nation. 
					
					    If the north-south joint declarations should be denied and their implementation suspended because of regime changes, no issue can be settled between the north and the south in the future.
					
					    The south Korean authorities should not just pay lip-service to respect for the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration but prove it in practice. 
					
					    The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that they are now standing at the crossroads: Whether they join hands with the north to repair the inter-Korean relations or they will meet the same miserable end as what their predecessors did while standing in confrontation with the north to the last. 
					
					    Consistent is the stand of the DPRK to pave a wide avenue to independent reunification by bringing about a great turn in the north-south relations.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place in Pyongyang on Monday, the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, Ro Tu Chol, and officials concerned and those of public organizations, members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification, Pyongyangites, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland. 
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report. 
					
					 He said that the historic Pyongyang summit and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration were the brilliant fruition of leader Kim Jong Il's outstanding Songun politics and noble will for reunification and the great feats of national historic significance to shine in the way of carving out the destiny of the nation and achieving national reunification. 
					
					 The reporter went on:
					
					 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration comprehensively clarifies all the principled matters for national reunification ranging from the basic idea, stand and way for national reunification to the realistic matters arising in the efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided all Koreans with a landmark for national reunification in the new century and wisely led the drive for implementing the June 15 joint declaration with his energetic leadership. 
					
					 In order to more powerfully promote the drive for implementing the June 15 joint declaration he provided the historic north-south summit in Pyongyang again in October 2007 and performed feats to go down in the history of the nation by giving the Koreans the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity", programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 Through the adoption of the October 4 declaration he laid a strong foundation for fully implementing the June 15 joint declaration and opened epochal prospect for substantially achieving the development of the inter-Korean relations and peace and prosperity through the north-south premier talks and inter-sector talks. 
					
					 Thanks to his distinguished and tested leadership the Korean nation could vigorously advance along the way of independent reunification under the banner of the north-south joint declaration despite vicious moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad for confrontation and war. 
					
					 The noble exploits performed by him in the history of the movement for national reunification are firmly preserved and successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The reporter called on all Koreans at home and abroad to launch a more dynamic nationwide struggle for implementing the north-south joint declarations this year marking the 70th anniversary of the liberation of Korea through great national unity under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un and thus fully implement the behests of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for national reunification and make this year a year of great turn in paving a wide avenue to independent reunification.

articles.title: Korean Documentary Film Screened
articles.content:
Korean Documentary Film Screened
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A Korean documentary film "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Meets with President Kim Dae Jung" was screened at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on Monday. 
					 The film shows scenes that the north-south summit was held and the June 15 joint declaration was published thanks to the experienced and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Among the audience were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, Ro Tu Chol and officials concerned, officials of public organizations, members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and people in the city.
					
					 Also among them were the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas compatriots staying in the socialist homeland.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Malaysian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Malaysian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Mohammad Nizan Bin Mohammad, Malaysian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Ponghwa Chemical Factory
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Ponghwa Chemical Factory
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field survey of the Ponghwa Chemical Factory.
					 The workers, technicians and scientists of the factory succeeded in locally producing catalyst for burning fuel while putting big efforts on the preparations for technical updating to turn the production processes into energy-saving style ones by their concerted efforts.
					
					 Going round different places of the factory, the premier learned in detail about the production there and orientation for new production process and encouraged the scientists and technicians in their drive to accelerate the building of an economic power with their scientific and technical achievements.
					
					 A consultative meeting of officials concerned took place on the spot.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues of conducting technological updating on the principle of putting the energy-saving style production processes on an intensive basis and, for the present, minimizing the fuel consumption and establishing rational and effective management and business strategy.
					
					 Saying that energy supply presents itself as an important issue in promoting the building of an economic power at present, the premier called on all factories and enterprises to push ahead with the work to turn production processes into energy-saving style ones.
					
					 He also made field survey of farming in Yomju and Tongrim counties, underscoring the need to put the manuring and cultivation on a scientific basis and give play to the mental power of agricultural workers.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets UN Resident Coordinator
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets UN Resident Coordinator
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on Monday received credentials from Tapan Mishra, United Nations resident coordinator and UNDP resident representative in the DPR of Korea.

articles.title: Protocol Signed between DPRK and Polish FMs
articles.content:
Protocol Signed between DPRK and Polish FMs
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A protocol on the cooperation between the foreign ministries of the DPRK and Poland was signed here on Monday.
					 The protocol was inked by Vice Foreign Minister Kung Sok Ung and Krzysztof Ciebien, Polish ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, returned home on Monday after participating in a meeting of high-level officials of the ASEAN Regional Forum held in Malaysia.

articles.title: Reception Given by British Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by British Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Michael John Gifford, British ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception on Monday to celebrate the official birthday of the queen of the UK, its national day
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-foreign minister, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, Son Kwang Ho, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.

articles.title: Vice-Chairman of AINDF Terms June 15 Joint Declaration Great Programme for Reunification
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of AINDF Terms June 15 Joint Declaration Great Programme for Reunification 
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) released a statement on Monday, the 15th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					 Thanks to the clairvoyant wisdom and patriotic bold decision, leader Kim Jong Il provided the south-north summit, the first of its kind in the history of Korea's division, in June 2000, made sure that the joint declaration was adopted, a great jubilee which gave great conviction and joy to Koreans longing for the reunification of the country and a special event which ushered in a new epochal phase of independent reunification, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The historic Pyongyang summit and the publication of the joint declaration are the brilliant fruition of Kim Jong Il's outstanding Songun politics and noble will for reunification and the greatest feat he performed in hewing out the destiny of the nation and reunifying the country.
					
					 The joint declaration provided by him serves as the invariable great programme of the Korean nation for reunification.
					
					 The people of all social standings should thoroughly shatter with the all-people do-or-die resistance the moves of the pro-U.S. conservative group to ignite a war against the north and stifle the compatriots as the group is trying to make the Koreans victims of a nuclear war while totally denying the south-north joint declarations.
					
					 They should never pardon the present conservative ruling forces' pro-U.S., pro-Japanese acts and moves to revive "yusin" dictatorship but valiantly struggle to realize independence and democracy of society.
					
					 The AINDF will together with the patriotic people remaining true to the noble patriotic intention of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the sun of the nation and the lodestar of national reunification, wage a more dynamic nationwide struggle to open up an epochal phase of independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation, firmly taking hold on the south-north joint declarations.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A stamp was issued in the DPRK on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The declaration, which serves as a milestone for national reunification, was adopted at the inter-Korean summit, the first of its kind in the history of national division, held in June Juche 89 (2000).
					
					 Seen on the upper part of the stamp are letters "In commemoration of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration". 
					
					 The stamp features the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification with letters "June 15 joint declaration", "By our nation itself" and "Reunification guidelines common to the nation".

articles.title: Memorial Service for Ex-President of ITF Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Ex-President of ITF Held
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A memorial service to mark the 13th anniversary of death of Choe Hong Hui, ex-president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF), took place at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery Monday.
					 Present at the service were Jang Ung, president of the ITF, a Taekwon-Do delegation headed by ITF Vice-President Leong Wai Meng, foreign Taekwon-Do practitioners, those concerned of Taekwon-Do, bereaved family members, Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, officials concerned and Taekwon-Do instructors and players.
					
					 The participants laid wreaths in the name of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, the ITF, the International Martial Arts Games Committee and the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs and bouquets at the grave of Choe Hong Hui before paying silent tribute to him.
					
					 Jang Ung in a memorial address said that he warmly remember Choe Hong Hui who devoted his life to Taekwon-Do, adding that his desire to make contributions to building a peaceful world would be surely achieved by joint efforts of Taekwon-Do practitioners.
					
					 Then the participants watched a demonstration of DPRK Taekwon-Do instructors and players at the Taekwon-Do Hall and looked round the Taekwon-Do Holy Hall.
					
					 The DPRK Cabinet gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant for the participants in the memorial service on the same day.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup Opens
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup Opens
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The 18th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup opened with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall Monday.
					 The championship brought together at least 700 players selected from provincial Taekwon-do teams and other units. They will compete in Taekwon-do and go games.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, Taekwon-do players and coaches and school youth and children.
					
					 Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, made an opening speech.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Opens
 Hamhung, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize opened with due ceremony at Hamhung Stadium Monday.
					 The contest will take place in Phyongsong, Sariwon, Nampho and other areas. The participants will compete in more than 10 events such as football, basketball, volleyball, table tennis and athletics.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, sportspersons, working people and youth and students in Hamhung City.
					
					 Kim Jong Su, first vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, made an opening speech.
					
					 After the ceremony there took place a men's football match between North Hwanghae Province and Rason City.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestler Wins Gold Medal in 2015 Asian Junior Wrestling Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestler Wins Gold Medal in 2015 Asian Junior Wrestling Championship
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestler Pak Wi Song bagged a gold medal in the 2015 Asian Junior Wrestling Championship on June 14.
					 In the 42 kg men's freestyle category he defeated his Sri Lankan rival at the preliminaries, Uzbek rival at the semifinals and Iranian rival at the finals, placing the first.
					
					 Another DPRK wrestler Kim Kum Hyok grabbed a silver medal at the 50 kg men's freestyle category.

articles.title: Officials and Members of Trade Unions Start Their Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites
articles.content:
Officials and Members of Trade Unions Start Their Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites
 Hyesan, June 15 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of trade unions started their study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A starting ceremony took place before the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Monday.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the monument and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A report was made to be followed by speeches.
					
					 They said that the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu are associated with the immortal revolutionary history of the peerlessly great persons, the spirit of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners to devotedly defend the leader and their indomitable fighting spirit and the noble intention of our party to achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 They vowed to hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for all ages and firmly defend and eternally glorify the revolutionary feats of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, they looked round the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo and visited the Hyesan Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery.

articles.title: World Blood Donor Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
World Blood Donor Day Observed in DPRK
 Nampho, June 15 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the Nampho City Blood Bank on Monday to mark World Blood Donor Day.
					 Present there were officials in the field of public health, officials concerned, voluntary blood donors, the acting representative of the WHO and members of the missions of international organizations in the DPRK, a delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the DPRK and foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of their embassies in the DPRK.
					
					 Speakers said observing World Blood Donor Day is aimed to satisfactorily supply safe blood and blood products by voluntary unpaid blood donors in all countries, calling for taking an active part in blood donation with ardent love for the society and human beings.
					
					 Certificates and souvenirs were handed over to voluntary blood donors at the event. The participants watched a video clip on the safe blood and blood donation and enjoyed a performance given by the artistes of Nampho City. 
					
					 Before the event, they went round the Nampho City Blood Bank and looked round photos introducing successes made by the DPRK in the blood transfusion.
					
					 The Day was also observed in all provinces on the same day.

articles.title: Syrian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Syrian Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Union of Syrian Peasants led by Chairman Hammad Abboud Al Saud left here for home on Monday.

articles.title: Osaka Branch Delegation of Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Osaka Branch Delegation of Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan Leaves
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Osaka Branch of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan headed by Chairman Song Jae Su left here on Monday.

articles.title: New Furniture Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Furniture Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Architectural Institute and the Yonggwang Furniture and Building Materials Company in the DPRK have recently produced new furniture effective in preventing geo-pathic stress and earth radiation.
					 In this regard, Kim Chan Bong, a director of the institute, told KCNA:
					
					 The institute succeeded in finding out timber with high shielding effect and developing shielding agent for paints.
					
					 The furniture have the effect of restoring the immunity of human body and healing such symptoms as insomnia, uneasiness and fatigue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits for National Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits for National Reunification 
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- It has been fifteen years since the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a milestone for national reunification, at the inter-Korean summit held for the first time in the history of national division.
					 The historic Pyongyang summit and the publication of the North-South Joint Declaration are entirely attributable to leader Kim Jong Il's ardent patriotism and his Songun (military-first) leadership.
					
					 After the publication of the joint declaration, the inter-Korean relations of distrust and confrontation had been turned into those of reconciliation, cooperation and unity.
					
					 Nearly 140 rounds of inter-Korean dialogues and contacts took place in seven years, including 21 rounds of inter-Korean ministerial talks, 13 rounds of meetings of the north-south committee for the promotion of economic cooperation and meetings of the inter-Korean military authorities.
					
					 Severed railways and roads were re-linked and air and sea routes opened between the north and the south, while grand festivals for national reunification taking place in Pyongyang and Seoul one after another.
					
					 Representatives of the south Korean political parties and public organizations, as well as personages of different social standings visited Pyongyang on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, in the wake of the visit to Pyongyang paid by a delegation of the south Korean pressmen.
					
					 It was another event of great significance that the Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity was signed at the inter-Korean summit held again in Pyongyang in October, 2007. The adoption of the declaration was a clear manifestation of the steadfast will of the Korean nation to achieve the national reunification.
					
					 The undying feats Kim Jong Il performed for national reunification will shine forever in the nation's history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving and Implementing North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving and Implementing North-South Joint Declaration 
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an editorial to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 It says:
					
					 The past 15 years go to clearly prove that respecting and sincerely implementing the declaration is the key to the improved inter-Korean relations and the guarantee for independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 The adoption of the June 15 joint declaration the keynote of which is to independently solve the issue of the country's reunification by pooling efforts of the Korean nation was a historic event that ushered in a new era of independent reunification.
					
					 Thanks to the declaration authorities-level dialogues and cooperation including the north-south ministerial talks made brisk headway, national independence and cooperation became the trend of the times and the confrontation on the Korean peninsula turned into the one between all Koreans and the U.S.
					
					 There took place joint national events for reunification in which north-south authorities and NGOs took part together and compatriots' minds and intentions merged into one under the slogan "We are one!" heard from Mt. Paektu to Mt. Halla.
					
					All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration representing the will of the reunification of people from all walks of life in the north, south and abroad was formed, the character of the nation-wide movement for Korea's reunification became distinct, the way for tour of Mt. Kumgang, famous mountain of the nation, was paved and the Kaesong Industrial Zone got operational.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations which had made dynamic advance since the adoption of the declaration was put into a catastrophic phase owing to the U.S. vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK and the south Korean puppet forces' treacherous acts of zealously following it and their moves for escalating the confrontation with compatriots. 
					
					 The north-south dialogue has been blocked and joint national events were aborted in the run-up to the anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration this year. This is an inevitable outcome of the puppet authorities' treacherous acts of persistently pursuing the anti-reunification confrontation, obsessed with inveterate repugnancy and bad blood toward compatriots. 
					
					 The editorial calls upon all Koreans in the north, south and abroad to get closely united under the banner of the north-south declarations, pave a wide avenue to independent reunification and usher in another June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Demand Resignation of Pro-U.S. Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Demand Resignation of Pro-U.S. Regime
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Minjok Ilbo on June 12 in an editorial demanded the resignation of the Park Geun Hye group. 
					 The editorial said:
					
					The people from all walks of life have become increasingly critical of the Park regime after the disclosure of the U.S. forces' introduction of anthrax germ and MERS case.
					
					 The Park regime has become a laughing stock of not only south Koreans but the world people.
					
					 In a word, the outbreak of MERS is like the second ferry Sewol tragedy. The incompetent regime should step down at once.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Servility to U.S.
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Servility to U.S.
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is kowtowing to the U.S., the arch criminal introducing anthrax germs into south Korea.
					 Park Geun Hye met with the new commander of the U.S. forces in the Pacific in south Korea on June 9 and made her eyes at him, explaining him about her policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen aimed at "unification through absorption".
					
					 Present there were the U.S. ambassador, the commander of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea, the commander of the U.S. Seventh Air Force and others directly responsible for the anthrax germ introduction case, but Park did not utter her viewpoint on the case.
					
					 Meanwhile, the chairman of puppet joint chiefs of staff also met the commander of the U.S. forces in the Pacific and visited warship Cheonan before holding a war confab while trumpeting about someone's "provocation".

articles.title: Memorial Service Held for Two Schoolgirls Killed by GIs
articles.content:
Memorial Service Held for Two Schoolgirls Killed by GIs
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- More than 10 civic and social organizations of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the committee for erecting the monument to Mi Son and Hyo Sun held a memorial service on the spot where Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son were killed by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in Yangju City, Kyonggi Province on June 13, 13 years since their brutal killing.
					 At the service the speakers said that the U.S. troops drove an armored car over the two schoolgirls on their way to their friend's birthday party on June 13, 2002.
					
					 If the history of this land had flown properly, there would have never been such a brutal murder of the two schoolgirls, they noted.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-Worker Policy Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-Worker Policy Protested
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Core members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference in Seoul on June 11 in protest against the puppet regime in its moves to retrogressively revise the structure of labor market, according to south Korean KBS.
					 They accused the "government" of unilaterally cutting wages without consultation of trade unions and retrogressively revising the structure of the labor market which would increase part-time jobs.
					
					 The Confederation would stage a general strike in case the "government" enforces the unpopular plan, they warned.
					
					 At the end of the press conference more than 30 core members of the organization entered into an indefinite sit-in.

articles.title: Anti-Park Geun Hye Sit-in Strikes Go on in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-Park Geun Hye Sit-in Strikes Go on in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Sit-in strikes of civic and public organizations of south Korea are going on in Seoul to denounce the Park Geun Hye group for aborting the June 15 joint national event.
					 On June 11 a press conference was held before the general building of the "government" as part of the sit-in strikes with the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy participating.
					
					 The organizations at the conference accused the Park regime of derailing the joint national event to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration under the pretext that it should be "purely event for culture and sports".
					
					 Saying that the independent reunification should be achieved By Our Nation Itself, they demanded the Park regime roll back its policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Blocking Joint National Event
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Blocking Joint National Event
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean preparatory committee for joint national events to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation and the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration in a statement by its spokesman on June 12 denounced the puppet group's moves to escalate the confrontation with the north, according to the south Korean internet paper Newsis.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the above-said joint national event was derailed because the Park Geun Hye regime bedeviled the north-south relations as the days go by escalating its military pressure and confrontation.
					
					 The "government" should not pay lip-service to dialogue but make a fundamental switchover in its "policy toward the north" in the direction of true peace and cooperation.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Labels Hwang Prime Minister-designate without Qualifications
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Labels Hwang Prime Minister-designate without Qualifications
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea in a commentary on June 10 labeled Hwang Kyo An prime minister-designate without qualifications.
					 The confirmation hearing on Hwang entered its last phase but there has been no clarification of a lot of doubts, the commentary said, adding:
					
					 He failed to produce the medical records explaining the reason why he was exempted from conscription and refused to submit information verifying the suspicion of tax evasion.
					
					 When he was holding the post of minister of Justice, he interfered in the prosecution's investigation into the Intelligence Service's involvement in the fraudulent election to protect the "president" and the ruling quarters.
					
					 The "National Assembly" should never approve of the confirmation of Hwang.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Clampdown on Chongryon Protested
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Clampdown on Chongryon Protested
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- An emergency meeting of Koreans in Kinki, Japan took place in Kyoto on June 10 protesting against the Japanese investigation authorities' clampdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and demanding release of illegally arrested Koreans.
					 Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, noted that the joint investigation group under the Kyoto Prefectural Police Headquarters arrested the director of the Korean Goods Sales Company and others on groundless charges and filed a suit against two of them at a court.
					
					 He called on Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan to turn out in the struggle to protect Chongryon and have those arrested and indicted officials released.
					
					 Kim Hak Bok, chairperson of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said the fascist action taken by the Kyoto prefectural prosecution authorities is a serious one aimed to tarnish the image of Chongryon, a dignified overseas compatriots' organization of the DPRK, and stem the trend towards improved DPRK-Japan ties.
					
					 At the meeting the representative of the defence counsel for arrestees disclosed the illegality of the action taken by the Japanese investigation authorities.
					
					 Then followed solidarity speeches by Japanese personages.
					
					 Protest speeches were made by Chongryon officials, protest group formed and a written protest read out there.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Organization Accuses Park Geun Hye Regime of Derailing Joint National Event
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Organization Accuses Park Geun Hye Regime of Derailing Joint National Event
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of South Koreans for Democracy and Reunification in Japan in a statement on June 11 said:
					 All Koreans have directed all efforts to holding joint national event and ushering in the second June 15 era this year marking the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 But this joint national event was aborted due to the unreasonable obstructions of the Park Geun Hye regime. 
					
					 June 15 forces in the south, north and overseas pledged to work hard to intensify the struggle for overpowering the anti-June 15 forces and greeting the second June 15 era for independent reunification in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration 
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held an event in Los Angeles on June 13 to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					 Present there were members of the U.S. Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, representatives of the organization from New York and Chicago and other Koreans. 
					
					 An opening address was made and the participants watched a video on the movement of the Korean nation for reunification for 15 years since the publication of the joint declaration. 
					
					 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was read out. It was followed by congratulatory speeches from the North and South Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration. 
					
					 A lecture was given under the title "Today and tomorrow of reunification movement". 
					
					 The lecturer referred to the five paragraphs of the June 15 joint declaration and said national reunification would be achieved when all Koreans advance hand in hand in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself. 
					
					 Implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration is the wisest way for national reunification and prosperity, he added.

articles.title: Kimjongilia, Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held in Russia, Mexico
articles.content:
Kimjongilia, Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held in Russia, Mexico
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a Kimjongilia exhibition in Russia and a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Mexico on June 6 and 9 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display there were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Potted Kimjongilias, their works, and books and photos introducing Songun Korea were also on show.
					
					 Dutov, vice mayor of Nakhodka, Russia, said the life of Kim Jong Il was the one of patriotic devotion and long journeys for the country and people.
					
					 While leading the Workers' Party of Korea for a long time, he achieved the unity and cohesion of its members in one thought and purpose, the vice mayor added.
					
					 A member of the Nakhodka City Assembly praised him as a great statesman who made great contributions to developing the party.
					
					 Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, praised Kim Jong Il as a great leader who turned the DPRK into a socialist power and an elder statesman who protected the global cause of socialism.

articles.title: Peruvian Body Slams U.S. for Its Germ Warfare Scenario against DPRK
articles.content:
Peruvian Body Slams U.S. for Its Germ Warfare Scenario against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism released a statement on June 5 in protest against the U.S. sinister design for a germ warfare against the Korean people.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S., oblivious of the lesson it drew from the defeat in the 1950-1953 Korean war, is scheming to inflict the disaster of a germ warfare upon the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly know that it can never subdue the Korean people.
					
					 The Korean people led by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, the brilliant commander of Songun, are fully prepared to cope with any forms of war and provocation and achieve the final victory.
					
					 Now that the nuclear force and military muscle of the DPRK are being recognized by the world, the U.S. is sadly mistaken if it thinks that it can browbeat the Korean people through a germ warfare.

articles.title: Finland-Korea Society Calls for Dynamic Movement of Solidarity with Korean People
articles.content:
Finland-Korea Society Calls for Dynamic Movement of Solidarity with Korean People
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Finland-Korea Society released a statement on June 6 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 It is a fruition of the reunification policy pursued by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, that the north-south joint declaration was adopted at the north-south summit on June 15, 2000.
					
					 True to the intention of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il devoted himself to realizing the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, the cherished desire of the Korean people.
					
					 The spirit of the historic joint declaration is still encouraging the Korean people in their just struggle.
					
					 However, unfortunately, the spirit of the declaration is not being applied to the present reality.
					
					 It is because the present south Korean regime is totally denying it and pursuing the policy of confrontation with the north.
					
					 This year marks the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 We call on all the progressive people and organizations to give wide publicity to the historical significance of the declaration and dynamically conduct an international solidarity movement to support the Korean people's struggle for reunification.

articles.title: Peruvian Personage Calls for Respecting and Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Peruvian Personage Calls for Respecting and Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Estuardo Martinez Perez, chairman of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, released a statement on June 9 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Noting that the June 15 joint declaration is a great programme for independent and peaceful reunification of Korea that affirmed the Korean people's will to reunify the country by their own efforts in the idea of By Our Nation Itself free from foreign interference, the statement went on:
					
					 It is the way for reunifying Korea independently and peacefully to implement the declaration in the interests of the Korean nation.
					
					 However, the declaration has not been brought to fruition for 15 years since its publication due to the obstructions of the outsiders undesirous of Korea's reunification and anti-reunification forces in south Korea.
					
					 We once again extend support and solidarity to the government and people of the DPRK in their efforts for achieving the country's reunification independently and peacefully in the spirit of the joint declaration and demand all the anti-reunification forces honor and thoroughly implement the declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Polish Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Polish Organization
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was posted by the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on its website on June 8. 
					 The work published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998) clarifies the five-point policy of the great national unity which serves as the important guidelines for achieving the great unity of the entire nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia lanzamiento de cohetes antibuques
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia lanzamiento de cohetes antibuques
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el lanzamiento de cohetes antibuques de nuevo tipo desarrollados a nivel sofisticado a  emplazarse en las unidades de marina del EPC.
					En el puesto de vigilancia, el Mariscal recibio el parte del plan de entrenamiento y dio la orden de comienzo.
					
					Los cohetes antibuques se lanzaron por turno.
					
					El Mariscal observo atentamente el estado de vuelo de los cohetes antibuques que aparecian en la pantalla.
					
					Los cohetes buscaron, distinguieron y acertaron correctamente los buques "enemigos" tras volar con seguridad manteniendo la altura definida.
					
					El Comandante Supremo expreso gran satisfaccion por la excelente capacidad de distincion de blancos de los cohetes.
					
					A traves de este entrenamiento, se manifesto sin reserva el poderio de cohetes antibuques de nuevo tipo emplazados en las unidades de las fuerzas navales del EPC, dijo y continuo con mucha alegria que con motivo de esta ocasion, se preparo otro nuevo jalon en el fortalecimiento de las autoctonas fuerzas maritimas y se fortalecio notablemente la capacidad de operacion naval de marina del EPC.
					
					En estos dias, se desarrollan sucesivamente los medios sofisticados de ataque a nuestro estilo para controlar totalmente las fuerzas hostiles, lo cual es el resultado enorgullecedor del esfuerzo abnegado de los cientificos, tecnicos y obreros de la rama de ciencia de defensa nacional, evaluo.
					
					El Mariscal dio las tareas que se presentan para fortalecer mas las fuerzas navales del EPC y desarrollar a nivel mundial la ciencia y tecnica de defensa nacional.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de grupos de propaganda artistica de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de grupos de propaganda artistica de EPC
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion de los grupos de propaganda artistica de las unidades 526, 762, 534 y 380 del EPC.
					En la escena se ofrecieron variadas piezas de distintas formas.
					
					Los ejecutantes cantaron las hazanas de los grandes lideres quienes prepararon la firme base por la prosperidad eterna de Corea y mostraron el aspecto orgulloso de los militares del EPC que avanzan con vigor hacia la victoria final siguiendo al Comandante Supremo.
					
					La funcion dio gran repercusion a los espectadores.
					
					El Mariscal expreso gran satisfaccion de que los miembros de los grupos de propaganda artistica ofrecieron la funcion de alto valor ideologico y artistico con las obras de gran significado cognoscitivo y educativo que reflejan con sensibilidad los asuntos politicos presentados por el Partido.
					
					Evaluo mucho a los creadores y artistas de los grupos de propaganda artistica de las unidades 526, 762 y 534 del EPC que hicieron bien la funcion con las obras llenas del patriotismo y el anhelo sobre los meritos de los uniformados y les dio el agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que los grupos de propaganda artistica de los cuerpos del EPC desempenan un papel de microfono del Partido y presento las tareas para crear y realizar muchas obras que aportan a formar a los oficiales y soldados como integrantes armados con el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, tratan los temas a mantenerse siempre en la educacion ideologica del EPC, tales como la educacion de 5 tipos, elevan la conciencia revolucionaria y clasista y muestran las relaciones entre el ejercito y el pueblo, la unidad entre los oficiales y soldados y el optimismo revolucionario.
					
					Presenciaron la funcion Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Ryom Chol Song, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon y los oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: Gobierno de RPDC llama a abrir coyuntura de viraje de desarrollo de relaciones N-S
articles.content:
Gobierno de RPDC llama a abrir coyuntura de viraje de desarrollo de relaciones N-S
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 15o aniversario de la Cumbre Norte-Sur celebrada por primera vez en la historia de la division nacional y de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion. 
					La nota senala que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il preparo la Cumbre Norte-Sur en Pyongyang, en acato al noble proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien dedico toda la vida por la reunificacion de la patria, y aprobo y publico la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, lo cual fue un acontecimiento historico que trajo el cambio trascendental en la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y en el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					La publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio permitio a ambas partes coreanas acoger una nueva era para eliminar la desconfianza y confrontacion perduradas durante mas de medio siglo y dirigirse a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion con las fuerzas unidas nacionales, subraya y continua:
					
					Si las relaciones intercoreanas hubieran marchado ininterrumpidamente de acuerdo con la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, se habrian alcanzado relevantes cambios y exitos en la solucion del problema de reunificacion, anhelo nacional. 
					
					Pero, debido a las maniobras de la banda conservadora surcoreana de Lee Myung Bak, que nego totalmente las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur, las relaciones intercoreanas retrocedieron a la era de confrontacion del pasado y se encuentran hoy en el dilema sin salida.
					
					Con la voluntad de salvar las relaciones intercoreanas en la grave crisis y abrir la coyuntura de viraje de reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, el gobierno de la RPDC aclara bajo la autorizacion las siguientes posiciones:
					
					1. Deben tener la firme posicion de resolver el problema de las relaciones Norte-Sur y la reunificacion del pais de manera independiente con las fuerzas unidas nacionales. 
					
					Esto es el espiritu fundamental de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					
					Ambas partes coreanas deben resolver con el fuerte espiritu nacional y conforme a los intereses y la aspiracion de la nacion todos los problemas que se presentan en la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y en la solucion del problema de reunificacion.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben recurrir a la "cooperacion internacional", que entrega a las fuerzas extranjeras el problema nacional y dana a la parte connacional bajo el amparo de las fuerzas foraneas, sino resolver el problema de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					2. No deben perseguir la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" que causa la desconfianza y enfrentamiento entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Dado que en el Norte y el Sur de Corea existen diferentes ideas y regimenes durante 70 anos, la unificacion segun el unico sistema no traera nada mas que la confrontacion y la guerra. 
					
					En la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, ambas partes coreanas ya habian acordado hacer esfuerzos por la reunificacion reconociendo que revisten la caracteristica comun el proyecto de la parte Norte sobre el sistema federal en etapa baja y la propuesta de la parte Sur sobre el sistema confederal.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben conocer claramente que el remedio mas racional y realista para la reunificacion es lograr la coexistencia y coprosperidad de ambas partes coreanas por encima de las diferencias de las ideologias y regimenes. 
					
					3. Deben parar los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC en confabulacion con EE.UU. 
					
					Al desarrollar incesantemente los simulacros conjuntos Key Resolve, Foal Eagle y otros ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC en contubernio con EE.UU., las autoridades surcoreanas congelaron el fervor de la nacion por la reunificacion y perdieron buenas oportunidades para la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Mientras continuen tales provocaciones y amenaza militares, no se mejoraran nunca los vinculos Norte-Sur ni se liberara la Peninsula Coreana del peligro de la guerra nuclear. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben entregar la vida y la seguridad de la nacion a los invasores actuando como brigada de choque para el cumplimiento de la estrategia hegemonica de EE.UU. sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					No tienen la necesidad de sentir la inquietud por el disuasivo de autodefensa nacional de la parte connacional que sirve para defender la dignidad y estabilidad nacionales y la paz de la nacion y no deben calumniarlo nunca mas. 
					
					Deben dejar todos los ejercicios militares de caracter agresivo junto con EE.UU. y dirigirse a defender la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana con las fuerzas unidas nacionales. 
					
					4. Deben preparar el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					La calumnia es un veneno que fomenta la desconfianza y la colera a la parte connacional y puede extenderse al choque fisico y a la guerra. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben parar todas las provocaciones que insultan y denigran a la RPDC, sin decir de boca la "confianza" y la "mejora de las relaciones bilaterales". 
					
					Deben cancelar con audacia los aparatos juridicos e institucionales que impiden los contactos, las visitas, el intercambio y la cooperacion entre ambas partes y crear el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas 
					
					5. Deben tomar las medidas practicas para ejecutar las historicas declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur. 
					
					La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre son acuerdos preciosos preparados en la Cumbre Norte-Sur para el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas y la coprosperidad nacional y son promesas de las autoridades Norte-Sur dadas ante la nacion. 
					
					Si se niegan las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y se suspende su ejecucion por el cambio del "poder", no se resolvera ningun problema en las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben decir solo con palabra que respetan la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Junio sino mostrar su voluntad con las acciones practicas. 
					
					Deben tener presente que ellas mismas estan en el dilema de mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas o enfrentarse con la RPDC y sufrir el fin tragico como sus antecesores. 
					
					Es invariable nuestra posicion de lograr el gran cambio en las relaciones Norte-Sur y abrir el ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente.

articles.title: Acto por 15o aniversario de publicacion de Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio
articles.content:
Acto por 15o aniversario de publicacion de Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en esta capital el acto central por el 15o aniversario de publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio del Norte y el Sur de Corea. 
					Asistieron Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, Ro Tu Chol, los funcionarios de entidades sociales, los miembros del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, los de las direcciones nortenas de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y de la Alianza Pannacional de la Juventud y los Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria, los trabajadores capitalinos, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y compatriotas de vista en la patria. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Yang Hyong Sop, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema. 
					
					El informante dijo que la historica Cumbre Norte-Sur en Pyongyang y la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio fueron nobles frutos de la politica de Songun y la voluntad de reunificacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y gran merito nacional a ser transmitido eternamente en la historia de la forja del destino de la nacion y la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					La Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio dilucida globalmente todos los problemas de principios por la reunificacion de la patria, desde el ideal, la posicion y los remedios fundamentales para la reunificacion hasta los asuntos realistas para el desarrollo de las relaciones internacionales a base del ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", dijo y continuo:
					
					Al dar a toda la nacion el jalon de reunificacion de la patria en el nuevo siglo, el Dirigente condujo sabiamente la lucha por la ejecucion de la declaracion conjunta. 
					
					Para ese fin, preparo de nuevo en octubre de 2007 la historica Cumbre Norte-Sur en Pyongyang y aprobo la "Declaracion para el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur, la paz y la prosperidad", programa de ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					
					Con la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre el Dirigente preparo la firme base para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y abrio la perspectiva para lograr el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas, la paz y la prosperidad a traves de las conversaciones entre los  premieres y las otras por sectores. 
					
					Gracias a la destacada y probada orientacion del Dirigente, la nacion coreana pudo marchar a pasos firmes por la unica senda de la reunificacion independiente bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur aun en medio de las perversas maniobras conflictivas y de guerra de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion internas y externas.
					
					Las nobles proezas del Dirigente registradas en la historia del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria se llevan adelante por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Este ano del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, los coreanos deben dinamizar la lucha pannacional para ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur siguiendo la sabia guia del Mariscal y con la gran unidad nacional. De esta manera, deben materializar los legados del los grandes lideres en materia de la reunificacion de la patria y hacer del presente un ano de gran cambio en la empresa por abrir el camino para la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria exhorta a ejecutar Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio
articles.content:
Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria exhorta a ejecutar Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Las direcciones en el Norte, Sur y ultramar de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) publicaron el dia 14 una declaracion conjunta dedicada al 15o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio.
					La nota subraya que la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio es el jalon comun y gran programa de la nacion por la paz y la reunificacion del pais y continua:
					
					La realidad en que esta dividido el territorio nacional sin considerarse la voluntad de la nacion y bloqueado la via de la paz, la reunificaron y la prosperidad comun de la nacion por la intervencion de las fuerzas exteriores, ensena la verdad de que la unica salida de la nacion es rechazar a las fuerzas exteriores.
					
					La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio que exhorta a lograr la reunificacion de la patria bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" al superar la diferencia de las ideas y regimenes existentes en el Norte y el Sur es el jalon mas justo y racional para la reunificacion y la piedra de toque que determina la reunificacion o la division.
					
					Resolver con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana todos los problemas pendientes en el cumplimiento de la causa de la reunificacion de la patria es el verdadero sentido de dicha Declaracion.
					
					Al apoyarse en el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", se resolveran con satisfaccion las dificultades pendientes en el curso del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, y la enfermedad vendepatria y servil a grandes potencias que incita la division y la confrontacion se podra cambiar en la independencia y el patriotismo.
					
					La guerra no es nada mas que una fanfarronada ante las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana.
					
					Las direcciones en el Norte, Sur y ultramar de la APRP aclaran de nuevo la voluntad y decision por la reunificacion de la patria como sigue:
					
					Enarbolaremos invariablemente la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio centrada en el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" como linea de vida en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Independientemente que se cambie la situacion en adelante, estaremos al frente de la lucha por defender la independencia y la paz de la patria frente a las fuerzas divisionistas y vendepatrias y las fuerzas agresivas de EE.UU. y Japon, bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					Es una la patria y la nacion independiente de la situacion del mundo.

articles.title: Comite Conjunto Nacional para Ejecucion de Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio llama a toda nacion
articles.content:
Comite Conjunto Nacional para Ejecucion de Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio llama a toda nacion
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- El Comite Conjunto Nacional para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio publico el dia 14 un llamamiento a todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar con la decision de eliminar todos los obstaculos en el camino de la reunificacion y abrir sin falta la segunda epoca de reunificacion independiente del 15 de junio, con motivo del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea.
					El documento subraya que la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio fue un acontecimiento que prometio ante toda nacion y el mundo acabar con la hostilidad y la  confrontacion entre el Norte y el Sur y resolver de manera independiente el problema de reunificacion del pais con la fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana y que cambio totalmente las relaciones intercoreanas en las de reconciliacion, la cooperacion, la paz, la reunificacion y la prosperidad comun.
					
					Sin embargo, se niega abiertamente el espiritu de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y se interrumpieron hasta los contactos y viajes entre las entidades civiles, al contrario de la aspiracion de toda nacion a la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales, apunta.
					
					La realidad en que se fracaso el acto conjunto nacional por el 15o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hace mas firme la voluntad de toda la nacion de abrir con las fuerzas unidas la brecha de la paz y la reunificacion, senala la nota y continua:
					
					!Resolvamos de manera independiente el problema de reunificacion del pais con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana, segun la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur!
					
					!Reanudemos y activemos mas todos los movimientos por la ejecucion de la declaracion que se realizaba en la epoca del 15 de junio!
					
					!Activemos el viaje, el contacto, la cooperacion y el encuentro de reunificacion de todos los estratos, segun el espiritu de las declaraciones Norte-Sur para ligar de nuevo el lazo y el vaso sanguineo de la nacion!
					
					!Luchemos rotundamente contra cualquier intencion de violar la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion, negar la historia de la agresion y saquear nuestro sagrado territorio!
					
					!Levantemonos unanimemente en el movimiento por la paz anti-guerra para detener todo tipo de los actos hostiles, los ejercicios conjuntos militares y las maniobras imprudentes de aumento de las fuerzas armadas que agravan la tension militar y acarrean el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana!
					
					!Vamos juntos toda la nacion en el Norte, Sur y ultramar al superar la diferencia de grupo, dependencia e ideal en el principio de priorizar la demanda y el interes comunes de la nacion y anteponer la gran obligacion nacional!
					
					!Elevemos mas el papel orientador del Comite Conjunto Nacional para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, organizacion de solidaridad del movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion, para realizar la gran unidad de la nacion!
					
					!Despleguemos activamente variados contactos, intercambios y encuentros de reunificacion de varios estratos en el "periodo de movimiento conjunto 15 de junio-15 de agosto" para impulsar la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion y abrir la segunda epoca de reunificacion de 15 de junio, segun el acuerdo del Norte, el Sur y ultramar!
					
					!Escribamos nueva historia de las relaciones intercoreanas y abramos sin falta el ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente en este ano significativo del 15o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, al manifestar plenamente la firme voluntad por la reunificacion y el entusiasmo patriotico de toda la nacion en el interior y exterior del pais!

articles.title: CRPP condena a banda de Park Geun-hye tendiente a confrontacion fratricida
articles.content:
CRPP condena a banda de Park Geun-hye tendiente a confrontacion fratricida
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 14 la informacion No. 1096 condenando la nueva artimana de la banda de Park Geun-hye contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El dia 13, los titeres surcoreanos, por medio de "KBS", dijeron absurdamente que la RPDC planto el codigo maligno en el espacio cibernetico utilizando como cebo la informacion sobre MERS y realiza el hacking contra ellos.
					
					La informacion condeno tal comportamiento calificandolo de otra provocacion contra la RPDC.
					
					El suelo surcoreano se ha convertido en un infierno, lo cual se debe enteramente al resultado inevitable que trajo la corrupta dominacion antipopular de la banda de Park Geun-hye, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					La banda titere surcoreana trata de ocultar su criminalidad que produjo la situacion de MERS y evitar la crisis de su poder desviando la opinion publica, revela.
					
					Es una gran equivocacion si la banda titere del Sur de Corea se da cuenta de que sea posible salir de un callejon de arruina  por su farsa intrigante anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Premier de RPDC recorre la Fabrica Quimica de Ponghw
articles.content:
Premier de RPDC recorre la Fabrica Quimica de Ponghwa
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, recorrio la Fabrica Quimica de Ponghwa.
					Los obreros, tecnicos y cientificos de la Fabrica produjeron con materiales domesticos el catalizador de inflamacion de combustibles mientras dan acicate a los preparativos de renovacion tecnica para cambiar las cadenas productivas por otras con pocas energias.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la fabrica, el premier hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de produccion y la direccion del establecimiento de nuevas cadenas productivas y estimulo a los cientificos y tecnicos que con sus exitos empujan confiablemente la construccion de la potencia economica.
					
					En el terreno tuvo lugar la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios de ramas interesadas.
					
					En la ocasion se abordaron los temas de realizar la renovacion tecnica en el principio de asegurar la intensificacion de la cadena productiva con pocas energias, disminuir al maximo el consumo de energia, establecer la  racional y eficiente estrategia administrativa y empresarial, etc.
					
					Al decir que en la epoca actual, la suministracion de energia se presenta como clave en la aceleracion de la construccion de la potencia economica, enfatizo que todas las fabricas y empresas deben cambiar los procesos de produccion por los otros con pocas energias.
					
					Al estudiar en el terreno las labores de las ramas agricolas de los distritos de Yomju y Tongrim, destaco la importancia de cientifizar el abonamiento y el cuido de los cultivos y estimular las fuerzas espirituales de los trabajadores agricolas.

articles.content:
Firmado protocolo sobre cooperacion entre ministerios de RR.EE. de RPDC y Polonia 
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado este lunes en esta capital el protocolo sobre la cooperacion entre los Ministerios de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Polonia. 
					El vicecanciller de la RPDC Kung Sok Ung y el embajador polaco en Corea Krzysztof Ciebien firmaron el documento.
